## Arjeh Cohen's example (a geometry for J2)

gens := [ (1,84)(2,20)(3,48)(4,56)(5,82)(6,67)(7,55)(8,41)(9,35)(10,40)(11,78)(12,100)(13,49)(14,37)(15,94)(16,76)(17,19)(18,44)(21,
    34)(22,85)(23,92)(24,57)(25,75)(26,28)(27,64)(29,90)(30,97)(31,38)(32,68)(33,69)(36,53)(39,61)(42,73)(43,91)(45,86)(46,
    81)(47,89)(50,93)(51,96)(52,72)(54,74)(58,99)(59,95)(60,63)(62,83)(65,70)(66,88)(71,87)(77,98)(79,80), 
  (1,80,22)(2,9,11)(3,53,87)(4,23,78)(5,51,18)(6,37,24)(8,27,60)(10,62,47)(12,65,31)(13,64,19)(14,61,52)(15,98,25)(16,73,
    32)(17,39,33)(20,97,58)(21,96,67)(26,93,99)(28,57,35)(29,71,55)(30,69,45)(34,86,82)(38,59,94)(40,43,91)(42,68,44)(46,85,
    89)(48,76,90)(49,92,77)(50,66,88)(54,95,56)(63,74,72)(70,81,75)(79,100,83) ];;
g := Group(gens);
g1 := Group( [(1,12)(2,22)(3,62)(4,67)(5,52)(6,72)(7,49)(8,60)(9,88)(10,96)(11,47)(13,59)(14,65)(15,34)(16,74)(17,81)(18,20)(19,94)(21,
    58)(23,85)(24,31)(25,87)(26,32)(27,91)(28,89)(29,35)(30,55)(33,77)(36,95)(37,99)(38,71)(39,79)(40,84)(41,51)(42,83)(43,
    48)(44,93)(45,46)(50,64)(53,97)(54,66)(56,57)(61,86)(63,78)(68,100)(69,75)(70,80)(73,92)(76,90)(82,98), 
  (1,57,34,20,11,24)(2,21)(3,84,98,78,77,39)(4,14,40,99,50,82)(5,41,58,100,92,18)(6,33,83,65,15,80)(7,74,88,49,54,76)(8,19,
    96,68,70,28)(9,59,29)(10,87,22,85,26,63)(12,89,72,43,91,51)(13,53,66)(16,55,36)(17,79,94,25,56,44)(30,35,90)(31,69,81,
    47,45,73)(32,86,60,64,62,38)(37,46)(42,52,75)(48,61)(67,93,71)(95,97) ] );
g2 := Group( [(1,57)(2,39)(3,11)(4,10)(5,94)(6,81)(8,75)(13,55)(14,25)(17,73)(18,62)(19,27)(20,84)(21,24)(22,43)(23,70)(26,92)(28,
	    42)(29,35)(31,82)(32,87)(33,56)(34,48)(36,53)(37,71)(38,80)(41,72)(44,60)(45,85)(46,52)(50,65)(51,64)(61,98)(67,68)(69,
	    89)(76,88)(77,78)(83,100)(91,99)(93,96), (1,43,86,71,99,91)(2,61,89,46,27,82)(3,70,34,19,20,67)(4,79,94,15,69,62)(5,37,
	    68,63,48,77)(6,65,16,50,41,13)(7,36,76,35,53,9)(8,31,84,57,10,42)(11,21,38,93,23,12)(14,54,92,51,30,87)(17,66,73,32,55,
	    25)(18,80)(22,33,96,45,100,24)(26,59,72,81,74,64)(28,83,85,98,40,58)(29,97,88,49,95,90)(39,75)(44,60,78,47,56,52) ] );

cg := CosetGeometry(g, [g1, g2]);
DrawDiagram( DiagramOfGeometry(cg), "J2");
